subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit Failure Trace not printed completely
msgSnippet: ... Why is a single line of a stack trace 240 characters? A deeper problem may be lurking.... Take care. J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software
messageBody:
>So said javainsel on 2003-06-12 --------------------
>--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Cox, Randy" <randy.cox@c...> wrote:
>> I believe you can also press the filter stack trace button on the
>right side
>> of the runner and the entire trace appears in the window.
>>
>> Randy Cox
>
>
>It doesn't help concerning width. After 240 characters the line is
>cropped. The rest of the line is not visible.

Why is a single line of a stack trace 240 characters? A deeper problem may be lurking....

Take care.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
